divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving with my brother home after dinner on butterfield rd. when i saw this red maroon thing flying about 200ft off the ground.when we drove under it i could see a light or a flame on the bottom(it was cloudy with no sun out so it couldnt be a reflection).the object was about 5-10ft square making no noise traveling east to west. im a aircraft buff and never seen anything like it, kind of scarry.
Summary: Maroon cube with a light or flame on the bottom.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Vernon Hills
There were no other sightings in Vernon Hills on or around June 12th 2010
